definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: name given to Gideon (acc. to Ju Jdg 6:32, where expl. as let Baal contend (cf. Dr:284, 4 Kö:ii. 1, 467); Impf. [[ירוב]] not elsewhere [yet [[תרוב]] Pr 3:30 Kt, and Inf. cstr. [[רוב]] Ju Jdg 21:23 Kt], hence We:Sm31 expl. as = [[יְרוּבַעַל]], √ [[ירח]], cf. [[יְרוּאֵל]], [[יְרִיאֵל]] (p.436b), so GFM:Ju Bu:Ju Now:Ju);—Ju Jdg 6:32, Jdg 7:1, Jdg 8:29, Jdg 8:35, Jdg 9:1 + 8 t. 9 ([[בָָּעַל]]- Jdg 9:24, Jdg 9:57), 1Sa 12:11; = [[יְרֻכֶּ֫שֶׁת]] † 2Sa 11:21 (v. [[בּשֶׁת]]
sub [[בושׁ]]); Ierobaal (usu.; so LXXL 1Sa 12:11, 2Sa 11:21, where LXX:B Ieroboam).—[[יׇרבְעָם]], v. [[רבב]]. p. 914.
